## PerfSample interface

A performance sample

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface PerfSample 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [numSlots](./web3.js.perfsample.numslots.md) | number | The number of slots in the sample period. |
|  [numTransactions](./web3.js.perfsample.numtransactions.md) | number | The number of transactions in the sample period. |
|  [samplePeriodSecs](./web3.js.perfsample.sampleperiodsecs.md) | number | The sample period in seconds. |
|  [slot](./web3.js.perfsample.slot.md) | number | The slot number of the sample. |
